text: is the current emperor of Japan. Naruhito is the eldest son of former emperor Akihito and Empress Michiko of Japan. He was originally known as His Imperial Highness The Prince Hiro but was later given the title of Crown Prince in 1991. His father Emperor Akihito announced in December 2017 that he would abdicate on 30 April 2019. Naruhito became emperor on 1 May 2019 and the enthronement was held on 22 October 2019. 273th Emperor Of Japan ==Early life and careers == Naruhito was born on 23 February 1960 at Imperial Household Agency Hospital, Imperial Palace in Tokyo, He was crowned prince of Japan in 1991, He was first study in Gakushūin, He was graduated at Gakushuin University in 1982, He was studying in The House or College of Scholars of Merton in the University of Oxford in 1983 to 1985 Naruhito and Masako were engaged in the spring of 1993, and married on 9 June 1993 at Imperial Shinto Hall in Tokyo, Naruhito and Masako's only child Aiko, Princess Toshi was born in 1 December 2001 at Imperial Household Agency Hospital in Tokyo Imperial Palace. ==Titles and styles== * 23 February 1960 – 23 February 1991: His Imperial Highness The Prince Hiro * 23 February 1991 – 30 April 2019: His Imperial Highness The Crown Prince of Japan * 1 May 2019 – present: His Majesty The Emperor of Japan ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Current national leaders Category:People from Tokyo Category:Emperors of Japan Category:Crown Princes and Princesses of Japan
title: Naruhito
